question: Which of the following is NOT correct about Alkynes?
option1: They contain at least two triple bond between two carbon atoms
option2: The number of hydrogen atoms is less in alkynes as compared to alkenes
option3: The general formula of Alkynes is C<sub>n</sub>H<sub>2n–2</sub>
answer: They contain at least two triple bond between two carbon atoms
explanation: Alkynes contain at least one triple bond between two carbon atoms. The number of hydrogen atoms is less in alkynes as compared to alkenes or alkanes. Their general formula is C<sub>n</sub>H<sub>2n–2</sub>.
